page.title: 17Lady Enid Jones
page.content:
Lady Jones was a member of the Boscawen family and was born at Hanmer. She married in Gresford Church and celebrated her golden wedding there. Her husband held many distinguished posts and served in both wars with distinction. She returned to the family home Trevalyn Hall in 1955.
Lady Jones was President of the Rossett Women's Institute and frequently entertained the Denbighshire Historical Society in Trevalyn Hall. In her book about her family she said that 11 generations had lived in the house since it was built in 1560.
Lady Jones died five years ago at the age of 90.
